name: spo-export-people-web-part-users
title: Extract the employees shown in the People Web part on pages in a selection of Site Collections to CSV
shortDescription: Sample showing how to extract the employees shown in the People Web part on pages in a selection of Site Collections
longDescription: One of my customs requested that we removed a specific employee from the People Web part in their Intranet ASAP as that employee had left rather abruptly. They had no idea where that employee was displayed hence this script

thumbnails.alt: Preview image of the sample Extract the employees shown in the People Web part on pages in a selection of Site Collections to CSV

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
